About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hello, my name is Andrew Ramirez. I am currently employed at Comerica Bank as a Credit Specialist. I enjoy all things finance but have a passion for anything technology related. I am a former teacher who is confident in public speaking, teaching, group management and creating curriculum from the ground up. I am a graduate of Central Michigan Unviersity and a recent graduate from Grand Circus Coding Bootcamp in Detroit, Michigan. I specialized in Front-End Web Development and am savy with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, and Angular.

Comerica Bank

Detroit, MI

Credit Specialist

I collaborate with Relationship Managers, Portfolio Managers, Underwriters and Credit Analysts to manage several cost centers in the Metro Detroit area. My role includes analyzing various company and personal financial statements to determine a client's credit worthiness. Using tax returns, credit reports, audited or self-prepared statements I am able to forecast how a loan will be paid back and with how much risk will be involved. Most recently I have been placed on a team from various credit departments that prepares materials and presentations for new hire trainings. It has been a blast to develop curriculum and activities for future credit specialists to enjoy. .

Collier Count Public Schools

Naples, FL

Business Technology Instructor

I had the pleasure of teaching 6th, 7th, and 8th grade at Immokalee Middle School. Each class had a mix of grades and each day was a new challenge but I loved every second of it! I taught students on a wide range of subjects from how to properly type on a keyboard to how to build a computer. My main role was teaching students about Microsoft programs such as Word, PowerPoint, Excel, and Outlook. After several weeks of instruction students would take a certification test through a third party vendor and potentially become Microsoft Office Specialists. I was fortunate enough to have the most students in the State of Florida become Microsoft Specialists at the middle school level. I also piloted various curriculum and an after school robotics club that went on to win the 1st annual district S.T.E.A.M competition.

First American Title

Grand Rapids, MI

Escrow Analyst

As an Escrow Analyst I was responsible for helping customers resolve any issues discovered after signing final mortgage documents. I was passionate about providing the best possible customer service and attending to all and any issues in a timely manner.
